Sections.Text: A meddlesome intruder has forced her way into Bosch's home. Time to give her a proper welcome.
Now your servitors are activated, and can move and attack the intruders.
Attacking works like moving or interacting. Select an attack either by clicking on it or pressing the corresponding number key.
Some actions will be dimmed and you will be unable to select them. This means you don't have a valid target in range of that action, so you need to move closer (or let them come to you).
Once you have selected an action, click on the target you wish to use it on. The display indicates how much AP the action will cost. Hit the Escape key to choose a different action.
Your Angry Shades have a melee attack, Chill Touch, which they must be adjacent to the target to use. Lost Souls can use their Ectoplasmic Discharge at a range of 6 spaces.

Your Vengeful Wraiths have Ego-based actions that give the intruders negative effects. They also have the action Ghastly Howl, which targets units on your side, NOT the Intruders and gives your ghosts a bonus to attack.
Let those Intruders know just how terrible a mistake it was to enter your domain.
